features: [3 Adjustable Sizes to Fit Large Sinks] Only fits sinks‘ length within 17.5"-21", please ensure your sink is within this range before purchasing, small sink is suggested to select the medium model; The dish drying rack in sink only main body capacity can be adjustable, the main body can be adjusted to 3 sizes:16.9'', 18.7'', 20.4'' (not include 2 suspension arms). You can put it in the sink, over the sink or on the countertop. Each suspension arm's length is 1.9"

[Innovative "Adjustable Capacity" Design] - Unlike other in sink drying rack that only allow for handle adjustments, ours can adjust the main body rack to increase 37% storage capacity. Product dimensions: 20.4''L x 11.8''W x 5.5''H(not including handle length)

[Multifunctional Capacity Storage] - This large sink dish drainer can hold 8 plates, 7 cups and 4 bowls. The over-the-sink design doesn't take up any counter space and allows water to drip into the sink directly to avoid pooling of water

[Practical Handles and Sturdy Construction] - Unlike other handles that need to be shortened when moving in sink or over sink, ours can lift the handles for position-adjustment directly, which is fast, time-saving and convenient.The dish drainer rack is strong enough to bear a weight of 26.4lbs, and the maximum weight capacity is 39lbs

[Anti-slip & Anti-scratch] - The sink drying rack features beads on both handles to prevent it from sliding while hanging over the sink; the bottom 4 feet are equipped with non-slip rubber sleeves to protect your counter and sink from scratches

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable Dish Drying Rack with Utensil Holder for Kirchen Sink *The length of main body can be adjusted to 3 sizes, 16.9'', 18.7'', and 20.4'' to fit different sinks. *IMPORTANT: Please ensure that your sink falls within this length range(17.5''-21.'') before purchasing, most small double sinks are more suitable for medium size not large sizeThe over-the-sink design prevents dripping on the countertop and avoids pooling waterThis sink dish drying rack can nicely hold 8 plates and air-dry your clean dishes, glasses, cups, and flatware
Expandable Design, Create Extra Storage Capacity

Durable Material and Sturdy Construction The dish rack is made of premium material that is for long-lasting use;This kitchen drying rack can support up to 26.4lbs with sturdy construction ;Practical handles are convenient for you to bring the rack up without bending;
3 Installation Methods to Fit Various Sinks
Put the Rack on Where You Like Over the Sink In the Sink On the Countertop

More Details of the Dish Strainer Anti-slip Beads The beads on both side's handles ensure the dish rack in sink is not easy to slide when hanging over the sink 8 Plate Slots This dish drainers for inside sink features a compartment with 8 dish slots to nicely hold and air-dry your clean dishes Utensil Holder The dish drainers for kitchen countertop comes with a removable cutlery holder for storing flatware Rubber Feet The over the sink drying rack has 4 rubber feet to protect the countertop and sink from scratches

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like it more than I thought I would!
reviews.reviewText: When I first opened it I thought to send it back because it looked so small, even for my farm house sink. Duh! It's adjustable and collapsed for mailing. Like so many others, there were an insufficient number of screws but it worked out because I needed only four (there were five - there should always be an even number because of the even number of predrilled holes).Its hard to find an in-sink dish drainer with a level area for glasses. Most manufacturers center the rails for holding dishes. They put "helpful" glass holders along the edges but when it's a tight squeeze in a small sink, it is impossible to use the glass holders. We need a flat space in the front (as this one does) for glasses or off center dish rails which leaves room to one side for glasses.People complaining about the screw placement - get over it. Its in the pictures and the screws present no problem with putting dishes in the drainer.I've never had one with grips that hold onto the top of the sink as this one does. That's what pleases me the most. With the drainer elevated, the dish scrubber easily fits between the gaps of the rails to stay upright. I've struggled for years trying to fit the dish scrubber into a space to hold it upright so it doesn't tilt and drain the liquid soap inside.Had I needed to expand this thing to a larger size, I would've knocked off a star or two for the missing screw. On behalf of those who do need it expanded, this company really needs to look at their quality control. I don't recall any review mentioning that they have an overage of screws and it's suspicious that the drainers arrive missing screws. Dudes, charge an extra 50 cents and put the correct number of screws in the package instead of saving a few cents and disappointing your customers on something so minor.Since I just got it, I can't say anything about durability but since I really like it, I hope it lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very satisfied with this product. Delivery was fast, easy to assemble and very functional. Nice space saver and I know I will be saving money having this instead of using the dishwasher. Excellent for a one person household and adjusts for various sink measurements. Sturdy and practical. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits a small RV sink.
reviews.reviewText: Fits what I need. Sharp screws where it's put together can scratch side of sink, so we'll need to cover them or something. turning them around may help, but then scratch dishes?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is easy to size for my sink. It has lots of space for dishes. I wish the silverware cup was larger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We waited for a long time to come but happy with the quality of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Terrible silverware holder
reviews.reviewText: The silverware holder doesn't even fit in the dish drainer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great dish rack because you don't have to guess what size you need, it's very easy to assemble and the fact that it will hang or sit inside your sink is also a plus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It didn’t meet my expectations… poor quality!
reviews.reviewText: The two halves didn’t align correctly causing the dish rack to be tilted. The rubber bumpers don’t help to balance. The screw in the side has not plastic cover which would help with preventing your sink to get scratched. Not impressive for the high dollars paid.
